title: Manage Post-Game Clean-up
description: After a game, a venue manager needs to coordinate the cleaning of the entire stadium.

tasks.description: Generate a detailed post-game cleaning checklist for all areas of the stadium (seating bowl, concourses, restrooms, suites).
Assign cleaning crews to different sections of the stadium.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and distributes the work assignments.

tasks.description: Monitor the progress of the cleaning crews and log the completion of each task.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent tracks the cleanup progress in real time.
